TopicTitle: The most weird screenshot in KSP's history... [The almighty toilet.]

Articles.Content:
So I've been in KSP a few mins ago, played around with facility destroyer stuff, and this happened. I have no words for that.![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
